internal.database

Class FileList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<Comparable[]>
        • internal.database.FileList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Comparable[]>, Collection<Comparable[]>, List<Comparable[]>, RandomAccess

    public class FileList
extends AbstractList<Comparable[]>
implements List<Comparable[]>, RandomAccess
    This class allows data tuples/tuples (e.g., those making up a relational table) to be stored in a random access file. This implementation requires that each tuple be packed into a fixed length byte array.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static String EXT
      File extension for data files.
      private RandomAccessFile file
      The random access file that holds the tuples.
      private int nRecords
      Counter for the number of tuples in this list.
      private int recordSize
      The number bytes required to store a "packed tuple"/record.
      private Table table
      The table it is used to store.

      Get the ith tuple by seeking to the correct file position and reading the record.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(Comparable[] tuple)
        Add a new tuple into the file list by packing it into a record and writing this record to the random access file. Write the record either at the end-of-file or into an empty slot.
        Specified by:
        add in interface Collection<Comparable[]>
        Specified by:
